title: Cuba vaccine success could open major opportunities
author: Authors
description: Cuba vaccine success could open major opportunities
cleaned_text: Cuba vaccine success could open major opportunities Friday, February 5, 2021 Significance The vaccine is one of four being developed by Cuba, which aims to become a key international vaccine supplier, to enhance the strategic and economic impacts of its health assistance abroad and to bring recently soaring domestic infection rates back under control. Impacts - With the efficacy of Cuba's vaccines still unproven, the government's 100-million-dose target remains a distant prospect. - Once a proven vaccine is available, the authorities will roll it out efficiently. - The medium-to-long-term potential for improved US-Cuba relations will increase US business and investor interest in Cuba. - US allies in Europe and the Caribbean will continue to seek Cuba's services and products regardless of US policy towards the island.
